data.actual_result: The tab closes, without being able to have enough time to read the error.
data.expected_result: after clicking done the error would pop up without closing the tab
data.short_description: When editing a voice channel, going beyond the character limit and pressing done would show the error, but will quickly close the tab, acting like the name change was saved.
data.steps_to_repro: - go to a voice channel and edit it - go beyong the character limit - click done
